content: repeat from * all the way around 72 ● round 13 - *2sc in next st single_crochet in next 11 sts repeat from * all the way around 78 ● round 14 - single_crochet in each st around 78 ○ note i changed colors at the end of this row by finishing stitch 78 with the new color i then crocheted over the ends in the next round ● round 15 and 16 - single_crochet in each st around 78 ● round 17 - *single_crochet in the next 16 sts ch10 and skip 6 sts single_crochet in next 17 sts repeat from * one more time 86 counting each chain as one st ● round 18 and 19 - single_crochet in each st around including each chain st from previous round 86 ● slip_stitch into first st of the round to join fasten_off and weave in ends to finish
